sentence.Network_en: Fernand smiled piteously. " A lover is never terrible, " he said.
sentence.Network_cn: 弗尔南多凄然微笑了一下, “ 一个情人是永远不会使人害怕的! ” 他说.

sentence.Network_en: Tears rolled down its face, and It'sobbed and howled very piteously.
sentence.Network_cn: 眼泪顺着他的脸哗哗地淌, 它可怜兮兮地哀号起来.

sentence.Network_en: She implored piteously a voice choked with sobs.
sentence.Network_cn: 她用哽咽了的嗓音苦苦哀求.
